Rust Bucket.description: A corroded, rusty old lab setup. Basic, no frills.

Field Technician.description: Tactical repair station used by survivors in the field.

Contaminated Worksite.description: Bright yellow, with biohazard symbols. High-security zone.

Tactical Emerald.description: Sleek green tactical theme. Everything is more advanced here.

Warlab Blacksite.description: Secret blacksite aesthetics. Shadowy, elite. Prestige-exclusive.

Dark Ops.description: Black and red stealth design awarded only to Raid masters.

Architect's Vault.description: A pristine high-tech lab awarded only to blueprint masters.
